title: 求dalao进来看下
author: Ant繁星飞跃
txt_content:
服务端正常启动 但是玩家进不去怎么回事
forge官服纯净1.7.10       客户端也是纯净1.7.10
[18:27:32] [Server thread/信息]: Stars_leap lost connection: TextComponent{text='Disconnected', siblings=[], style=Style{hasParent=false, color=null, bold=null, italic=null, underlined=null, obfuscated=null, clickEvent=null, hoverEvent=null}}

请dalao解答下
